title: Why QAnon is here to stay
description:
QAnon was born and perpetuated on the internet. What is it and why is it dangerous?
Featuring:
AdrienneLaFrance (@AdrienneLaF)
Casey Newton (@CaseyNewton)
Links:
Adrienne's piece for The Atlantic
Casey's column for The Verge
Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host of Reset
About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
